getSizeInMemory

public long getSizeInMemory()
Description copied from interface: Cache
Gets the size of the memory store for this cache Warning: This method can be very expensive to run. Allow approximately 1 second per 1MB of entries. Running this method could create liveness problems because the object lock is held for a long period

Specified by:
